title: My DIY drip-line IRRIGATION setup EXPLAINED while welding a BROADFORK!

tasks.task: Setting up a drip irrigation system for a garden
subtasks: Installing a drip line irrigation system to improve water efficiency
Replacing a tine on a broad fork
Welding a metal part for the irrigation system
